articles.description: The 8th Edition of the Bengaluru Marathon was held on Sunday at Sree Kanteerava Stadium. | Bengaluru News
articles.content: A 92-year-old man completed a 5km-run at Bengaluru Marathon, outpacing many along the way, BJP MP Tejasvi Surya said on Sunday. Sharing the video on Twitter, the Lok Sabha member representing the Ban… [+1250 chars]

articles.description: Dipika Pallikal   Joshna Chinappa WIN Women s Doubles title of Squash World Doubles Championships after stunning 2nd seeds Sarah-Jane Perry Alison Waters 2-1 in Final. pic.twitter.com ls85wDwxUY — India_AllSports (@India_AllSports) April 9, 2022   Just happy …
